Structs/TypographyLayout.html#/s:11YMatt.name: font
Structs/TypographyLayout.html#/s:11YMatt.abstract: Font to use (potentially scaled and considering Accessibility Bold Text)

Structs/TypographyLayout.html#/s:11YMatt.name: lineHeight
Structs/TypographyLayout.html#/s:11YMatt.abstract: Scaled line height to use with this font

Structs/TypographyLayout.html#/s:11YMatt.name: baselineOffset
Structs/TypographyLayout.html#/s:11YMatt.abstract: Baseline offset to use with this font (to vertically center the text within the line height)

Structs/TypographyLayout.html#/s:11YMatt.name: kerning
Structs/TypographyLayout.html#/s:11YMatt.abstract: Kerning to apply for letter spacing with this font

Structs/TypographyLayout.html#/s:11YMatt.name: paragraphStyle
Structs/TypographyLayout.html#/s:11YMatt.abstract: Paragraph style with the correct line height for rendering multi-line text

Structs/TypographyLayout.html#/s:11YMatt.name: lineHeightMultiple
Structs/TypographyLayout.html#/s:11YMatt.abstract: Line height multiple to use with this font (to achieve the desired line height)

Structs/TypographyLayout.html#/s:11YMatt.name: needsStylingForSingleLine
Structs/TypographyLayout.html#/s:11YMatt.abstract: Whether the text needs to styled as an attributed string to display properly.

Structs/SFProFontFamily.html#/s:11YMatte.name: weightName(for:)
Structs/SFProFontFamily.html#/s:11YMatte.abstract: Generates a weight name suffix as part of a full font name. Not all fonts support all 9 weights.

Structs/SFProFontFamily.html#/s:11YMatte.name: fontNameSuffix
Structs/SFProFontFamily.html#/s:11YMatte.abstract: Optional suffix to use for the font name.

Structs/SystemFontInfo.html#/s:11YMatter.name: font(for:pointSize:compatibleWith:)
Structs/SystemFontInfo.html#/s:11YMatter.abstract: Returns a font for the specified weight and pointSize that is compatible with the traitCollection

Structs/Typography/FontWeight.html#/s:11.name: systemWeight
Structs/Typography/FontWeight.html#/s:11.abstract: Conversion from FontWeight enum to UIFont.Weight struct

Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.name: fontFamily
Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.abstract: Information about the font family

Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.name: fontWeight
Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.abstract: Font weight

Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.name: fontSize
Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.abstract: Font size (aka point size)

Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.name: lineHeight
Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.abstract: Line height (typically greater than font size)

Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.name: letterSpacing
Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.abstract: Letter spacing (in points, not percentage)

Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.name: textCase
Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.abstract: Text case

Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.name: textDecoration
Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.abstract: Text decoration (none, underline, or strikethrough)

Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.name: textStyle
Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.abstract: The text style (e.g. Body or Title) that this font most closely represents.

Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.name: isFixed
Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.abstract: Whether this font is fixed in size or should be scaled through Dynamic Type

Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.abstract: Initializes a typography instance with the specified parameters

Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.abstract: Initializes a typography instance with the specified parameters

Structs/Typography/FontWeight.html.name: FontWeight
Structs/Typography/FontWeight.html.abstract: The nine basic font weights. Not all fonts support all 9 weights.

Structs/Typography/FontStyle.html.name: FontStyle
Structs/Typography/FontStyle.html.abstract: Font style (used together with font family name and font weight to load a specific font)

Structs/Typography/TextCase.html.name: TextCase
Structs/Typography/TextCase.html.abstract: Capitalization to be applied to user-facing text

Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.abstract: Generates the font and auxilliary layout information needed to render the Typography

Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.name: regular
Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.abstract: Returns a copy of the Typography but with .regular font weight

Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.name: bold

Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.name: letterSpacing(_:)
Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.abstract: Returns a copy of the Typography but with the new letterSpacing applied.

Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.name: textCase(_:)
Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.abstract: Returns a copy of the Typography but with the new textCase applied.

Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.name: decoration(_:)
Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.abstract: Returns a copy of the Typography but with the new textDecoration applied.

Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.name: sfProDisplayItalic

Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.name: sfProTextItalic

Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.abstract: Standard typography for labels (uses the system font)

Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.name: systemButton

Structs/Typography.html#/s:11YMatterType.name: smallSystem

Structs/FontInfo.html.abstract: Information about a font family. Default implementation of FontRepresentable.

Structs/Typography.html.name: Typography
Structs/Typography.html.abstract: Represents a font as it would appear in a design document

Structs/SystemFontInfo.html.name: SystemFontInfo

Protocols/FontRepresentable.html#/s:11YM.name: accessibilityBoldWeight(for:)

Protocols/FontRepresentable.html#/s:11YM.name: isBoldTextEnabled(compatibleWith:)

Protocols/FontRepresentable.html.name: FontRepresentable
Protocols/FontRepresentable.html.abstract: Information about a font family. When an app specifies a custom font, they will
